rows.name: Is something wrong?

Have you heard anything
interesting lately?
Hi there!
Let's hear the details.
Leave it to me!
I'll do what I can.
Looks like everything worked out.
Everything should be fine now!
That's not good...

Hmmmmm... This is awkward...
What should we do?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     What should we do? I need to
think about this one carefully...
I'd like to help, if that's okay.

Leave it to us!
We'll sort everything out.

Well, someone's got to take care of
this. We'll see what we can organize!
Oh, I see...
Roger!
Really?
Thanks!
Uh-huh...
Are you okay?!
Are you all right?
It's no problem at all.
Yeah.
Er, no.
I'm sorry.

Here, have a Whelzaman Cookie!
Seori and Mikumari made them.
Sorry, but no.
I'm back!
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Huh?!
No worries.
Heheh. Pretty impressive, right?
Here you go.
So, the thing is...
This is...
What...?
Wow...pretty impressive!
Okay!
Hey, could I ask you about something?

Have you heard anything about a girl
called Nia, who was captured by the
Superbians recently?

Did you see a Gulan boy come
running this way from the port?

Have you heard about anything
untoward going on at the Invidia-
Superbian summit?
Something wrong?
Got any interesting info?
Hey.
Now this I have to hear.
We'll take care of it!
We'll give it our best shot!

And that's another problem
all sorted out!
A job well done, I reckon.
Wow, that sucks...
...Talk about a tricky situation...
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Which should I choose...?

We'll help you out.
Shouldn't be too much trouble.

Can't just leave you in the lurch here.
We'll sort it out!

We can help you out, if you've a mind
to let us handle it.
Oh, right.
Got it.
Is that right?
Thanks.
Riiiiight.
You okay there?!
You okay?
That's totally fine.
Yup.
Nah.
Sorry.

Want a Whelzaman Cookie?
I think they're pretty decent.
I don't think so.
We're back!
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Huh?!
No worries.
All in a day's work!
Here you go.
So here's the thing...
Ahh, this is...
Huh...?
That's pretty neat.
Yeah!
Hey, can I ask you something?

Hey, did you see a Gulan boy round
here? He was stealing stuff.

Hey, you heard about anything
suspicious going down at the
Invidia-Superbian summit?
Something bothering friend?
Tora want to hear gossip!
Hello friend!
Tora want more info!
Tora and friends handle it!

Tora will do best effort.
But can't make promise!
Everything okay now!

No more need for worry.
Everything sorted out.
That sound bad. Very bad.

Meh-meh-meh!
This tricky-tricky situation...
Ohh... Tora not good at hard decisions...

Tora want to help out.
Should be easy for Tora and friends!

With Tora on the job,
problem solved in no time!

Leave it to Tora...uh, to Rex-Rex and
friends! They handle it somehow.
That make sense.
Tora get it!
Really-truly?
Much thanks!
Meh-meh...
Have no fear! Mighty Tora is here!
Friend is okay?
No problem for Tora!
Yes-yes.
No, meh.
Tora sorry...

Whelzaman Cookie for you?
If do not want, that okay,
Tora eat instead!
Tora think no.
Tora back!
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Meh-meh?!
No problems.
Meh-heh-heh!
Here, friend take!
Let Tora explain...
Meh-meh...!
Meh-meh...?
Meh-meh! Amazing!
Mehmeh!
Please answer question of Tora!

Did friend see Gulan boy who took
important thing from Rex-Rex?

Soon will be big summit talk thing, yes?
Friend know anything about suspicious
things happening there?
Tell me, what's the word on the street?
Hey there.
We got this.
Seems everything's fine and dandy now.
That's rough, that is...
We'll help you out.
Ahh, I get ya.
Gotcha.
Thanks a bunch!
You still breathin'?
Is something the matter?

We need information.
Anything would be helpful.
Greetings.
I would be interested to hear the details.
We will handle this task without fail.
We will do everything in our power.
A satisfactory conclusion.

Worry not. The situation has
been taken care of.
How unfortunate.
Well, this is a tricky conundrum...
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I must choose wisely...
Allow us to assist.

How could we turn our backs on
those in need? We will do all we can.

Will you permit us to take care of it?
We know just the people.
I see.
Understood.
Is that so?
I thank you.
I...see.
Are you safe?
Are you quite all right?
That is quite all right.
Indeed.
Hmm...no.
My apologies.

Here, have this.
It's a Whelzaman Cookie.
I think not.
We have returned.
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Wha-?!
Worry not.

Such trifling matters are no
trouble at all.
Here - this is for you.
Allow me to explain...
Hmm, this is...
What...?
How remarkable.
Very good.
May we ask you about something?
Something wrong?

Hey, hit me with the hottest
info you've got.
Wassup?
Let's hear the juicy details.
Leave it to the Zekenator!

Hahah! I hope you don't think this is
a job the Zekenator can't handle!
And that's that, I reckon!

With the Zekenator on the case,
this job was almost too easy.
Damn, that ain't good.
Well... This is a toughie.
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I better think this one through...

You need some help?
Good thing I'm here, then!

We'll take care of this in
no time flat.

The Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries will
take on this job!
Makes sense.
Roger that!
For reals?
Cheers.
Right, sure...
The Zekenator is on the scene!
You all right?
No probs.
Yeah.
Nuh-uh.
Sorry.

Here, have a Whelzaman Cookie.
No promises 'bout the taste though!
Sorry, not happening.
We're back!
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
What the...?!
No worries.

Did you expect any less from
the Zekenator?
Here you go.
So here's the thing, yeah...?
Ah, this is...
Pretty classy stuff.
Awesome.
Hey there. Got a question for you.

Know anything about a black-market
merchant who's been up to no good
here in Acedia?

I'd like to hear the details.
Rex, what about you?
Yeah, same here! Can you fill us in?

Rex, shall we get to work on
this right away?

With you by my side, Homura,
I'm up to any challenge!
I guess that's that solved then.
All thanks to your hard work, Nia!

Zeke-san...we have to do something
about this, right?

Things don't sound good, that's
for sure. It's a bad situation.
What a difficult situation...

If Tora and Homura-chan use brains, can
maybe find answer to problem!

Meleph-san...
This is a difficult decision, I know...

Yes... I must consider carefully and
choose the option I believe to be best.
We're going to help, right, Rex?

Of course!
Let's do everything we can!
Thank you so much!
You're not hurt, are you?

Now Hana and friends here,
nothing to worry about!
Are you okay?

I'm sure everything's fine.
You're such a worrywart, Homura.
It's no problem at all, really.

I see the Holy Grail has excellent manners,
as well as awesome powers.
Sorry to keep you waiting!
We have returned from our task.
Here you go!
We went through a lot to get this.
Is this all right?
I reckon so!

Hey, Byakko. I think this person
might have information for us.

In such cases, I find the best course
of action is to listen to what they
have to say.
I think we need to hear the details.

Hikari the sort who stick her
nose into anything!

Leave it to us!
I know we can do it!
Just as long as you don't OVERdo it...

Rex. I really worked hard on this.
I'd say I'm due a reward of some kind.

Huh?!
Uhm... Let me think about it.

Everything's fine now.
With me and Kagutsuchi on the case,
how could it not be?
It was the only possible outcome.

Ooh, this is tricky.
What do you think, Hikari?

All I know is, worrying never
fixes anything!

We'll take care of this!
Right, Hikari?

If that's what you want to do,
I guess I can't exactly say no.
Really, it no problem for Hana!

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Ah, Hana's really growing up.
She's so gracious.
Hi again!
We have just returned.
Lovely.
I guess this works.
Thank you!

What my companion meant by
that was, "Salutations!"

Tora can handle this without even
making fur of Tora sweaty!
I do not doubt it, my furry friend.

We made light work of this one!
Aren't we just the best?

My lady... Sometimes modesty is
the cardinal virtue.

Wow...that's about as bad as
when you're salvaging and a
Grebb comes out...

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I had no idea being a salvager
was such a terrifying ordeal...

My Lady... I respectfully counsel you
to use your best discretion here.

Yeah, I know. Better not make a
decision I'm going to regret.

We must solve this predicament.
Byakko, will you assist too?
But of course. I live to serve!
Thank you so much!
You have my gratitude also.
Are you all right?
Have no fear.
Is friend okay?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Perhaps I should let Hana-san handle
this one herself...
That works.

Yes, quite. I could hardly have
put it better myself.
It sounds like something's up.
Hana want more detail!

Hana! Ask this person if they
have helpful information!

Is Masterpon being lazy and
making Hana do all work?

Nia, Hana very interested to
hear details of this.

Yeah, me too.
Can you give us the lowdown?

Leave it to us! Hey Hana, have you
got a special feature to take care of
this in two seconds flat?

Hana have many features,
but none quite that specialized.
Will take at least three seconds.

Everything is okay now?
All worry is over?

Masterpon... Hana think
you worry too hard.

Rex... What is best course
of action in this situation?

I'm not sure myself... But if we
work together, I'm sure we can
come up with something!

Tora can not bear to abandon people
who need help. Leave it to Tora!

Masterpon...!
Such kindness! Such Heroponity!
Are you all right?
Meleph sort out any problems!
Is no need to make big fuss over, really.

Masterpon showing good manners?
This seem like improbable occurrence.
Maybe Armus fly next.
Hana and friends back now!
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     How is she always so cute...?
Hey, could Hana talk with friend a bit?

We'd like to hear any interesting
news you might have heard.
We could do with some details, I feel.
Yes please. More info very helpful!
Surely Meleph can take care of this?

Perhaps, but not without your
sterling support, Hana.

All problem over now.
Time for sigh of relief.
Well spoken, Hana.
Masterpon... This not sound good.

Yes. Very not good.
As bad as time when Tora
touch Core Crystal...

Homura. What is right course of action
in situation like this?

Honestly... I'm not sure if there is a
right or wrong answer here, Hana.
It's a judgment call.
The Zekenator is here to help!
Hana help too!

Please, no worrying!
Everything fine now!

With you in that form, it really does
feel like we can handle anything...
We're back. Not too late, are we?

Looks like friend has waited
very patiently for us to get back!
Mehmeh!
Very eloquently put, Masterpon!
Hello friend!
May we converse with you a little?

Hana take care of it.
No need for worry.
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     My, Hana is really growing up.

There's no problem we can't solve
when we work together - right, Hana?

Meh-meh! Hana and Hikari
great combination!

Mehmeh! Such horrible situation...
Almost bad as Tasty Sausage supply
run dry...

Masterpon... Hana think situation
slightly more serious than sausages.

This seems kind of complicated.
What to do...?

Rex! We can solve all
problem by work together!

Hana! What is best choice to
make in this situation?

Hana not know answer.
Will leave decision to wise Masterpon.

Masterpon! If we get help of Blade
friends, we can solve problem.

Mehmeh!
Hana is right!
Are you...Okay?
Hana a little worried too...

Hana and friends return
from long journey!
Yeah. And I'm knackered!
Hana, hand over the goods!

Goods...?
Oh, Hana know what Zeke mean.
Here you go, friend.
Tell me! What's today's hot topic?
Yes yes! Give Tora gossip!

Yo! Isn't today just the greatest day?
It is, right?!

Suzaku... I don't think small talk is your
strong suit. Let's just see what our
friend here has to say, shall we?

Rex...are you up for this task?
It doesn't sound easy.

Agreed. But if we keep our wits
about us, we can handle it!
Warrk! Warrk!

Whoa, don't surprise me like that, Suzaku!
Was that your victory cry or something?

Hmmm... This does not sound like
a pleasant situation.

Indeed...but it is not a
hopeless one, either!

We'll resolve this matter!
Right, Nia?

I mean, sure. I was going to say
that if you didn't.

Maybe this something Suzaku can
help with?

I wouldn't mind...but I think we
have plenty of other mercs who
can lend a hand.

No need to worry yourself!
Squar-ha-ha-ha-hark!
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Suzaku not too good at being polite...

The item you desire is either in
my left pouch or my right pouch...
Can you guess which one?

Suzaku... I think we can skip this.
Just hand it over.
All right!
Very good.

Hello friend!
Oh, Kagutsuchi, do special greeting from
palace you tell me about before!

Ah...the Superbian ceremonial curtsey
is reserved for certain formal situations.
Let's just talk normally for now.

We will take care of it. Kagutsuchi,
I hope you will lend me your aid.

But of course, Meleph-sama.
I hope I can satisfy your expectations.

Hahah! Haaaaahahah! Hahaha!
Hahahaha! HAH!

I think what he means to say is that the
job presented few difficulties for him.

This big difficult...
What Kagutsuchi think we should do?

Hana, you still have so much to learn.
When you get more experience, you'll
know what to do in times like these.
Meleph-sama, if I may...

It's fine, Kagutsuchi, you don't have to
say it. Let's resolve this situation.

Meh! Thank you! Mehmeh!
Mehmeh! Thank you! Meh!

More is not always better, Tora.
Don't you think a single thank you
would suffice?
Are you all right?!

Now that we're here, there is
no need to worry.
Are you all right...?
Nothing too bad, I hope.
Really, it is no problem.
Hey, no problem.
Does this seem acceptable?
I would say so, yes.

Sounds like something's wrong.
What do you think, Saika?
Yeah, we should find out more.

Hana think we should subject
this person to interrogation.

Erm... Or we could just have
a normal conversation...

Hey. Why don't you tell me something
funny? Like, something side-splitting.

Oh, Hikari... If you put the pressure on
like that, it's impossible to be funny.

I reckon we ought to find out more.
What d'you think, Saika?

With you on that one, Princey.
Let's hear the details.

Saika...This won't be easy!
I hope you're prepared!

It'll be fine as long as Zeke looks out
for us with his Eye of Shining Justice.

Your problems are now nothing
more than dust on the Purple
Lightning Dreamsmasher!
That's my Prince for you...

Saika... Hana not think this
sound very good.
I'm with you on that one, Hana.
We're here to offer a helping hand.

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Wow, she really knows how to project
confidence. I wish my Prince knew
how to do that...quietly.
You all right there?!

Once my Prince busts in there with
his Ultimate Lightning Fury Slash,
your worries will be over. Probably.
Hey, are you sure you're okay?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I wish Zeke could show concern for
people like Rex does...
Something wrong maybe?
Something troublesome, I'll wager.

Wadatsumi, I think we might have
found someone who can give us
useful information!
I can only hope you are correct.

Worry not. Kagutsuchi and I will
handle this task without fail!
Well said. We will not disappoint.
I feel our task has come to an end.

Your efforts are much appreciated,
Wadatsumi.
This is a really tough decision.

Many and manifold are the
burdens of leadership!

Wadatsumi, if it were your call,
what would you do?

Can there be any doubt?
We must help those in need!
Just in the nick of time!
It's all right now. I will protect you.

Please, do not concern yourself.
It is no problem at all.

Such humility... You are more like
Nefer than you know, Wadatsumi.
We have returned.
Apologies for making you wait.
Is this acceptable?
I should think so, Wadatsumi.

With this, peace is restored to
the world once more!
Tora not sure it quite such a big deal...

I hear it! The cosmos calling out
for an ally of justice!

I don't hear any cosmic voices,
myself... Though the situation
does sound unfortunate.

This is a job for heroes like us.
Right, Glen?

Yes! Leave it to us!
Justice is certain to prevail!
Looks like we made it just in time...

Have no fear!
The upholders of justice are here!

On the wings of justice, we've
returned from our mission!
Simmer down a bit, will you, Glen?
Wooargh!!! Tell us useful info!!!

Well, you heard the scary guy.
You should probably spill whatever
info you've got, quick.

Wooorgh!
How are you?!

Don't be scared... He's just
trying to say hello.

No need for worry.
Jikarao take care of this easy!

Woooargh!!!
Let me at it!!!

Woorgh! Raargh!
Everything's fine now!!!

Heheheh... That's right, Jikarao.
Everything's taken care of.

I will help you! Understand?!
Me!!! Help you!!!

I'm right behind you there, Jikarao.
Let's help out!

It'll be tough, but we gotta do this.
Vasara... Remember what I said
about teamwork this time.
It's inscribed on my heart, my liege.
Our task is done.

And with a minimum of effort, thanks
to your sterling support, Vasara.

Yo, Vasara. What do you think
we should do?
I trust your judgment.

Vasara... Maybe you and the guys
could look into this?
Yes, my liege!

My furry companion may
have something for you.

Mehmeh!
Where did Tora put it...
Something up...?

It sounds more serious than
your everyday chit-chat.
Let's hear the details.
Meleph, this topic has caught my interest.
Yes... We must hear more.

Yuou'll make light work of this.
He's a guy to count on.

Ha! Well, I couldn't do it without you,
Zeke. But I won't let you down!
Yuou, what do you think?

We have to help. I'd say we're
the only ones who can!
Are you sure you're all right?

Tell Yuou if you have problem!
Maybe he help!

Greetings, commoner. I wish to be
amused with some diverting stories of
life as a member of the common herd.
Erm... He means, "Hi".

It seems rather beneath my station
to handle such a menial task...

Come now, Kubira... Is it not the duty
of a ruler to solve the problems of the
people? We will take care of it.
Honestly, it wasn't even all that difficult.

Thanks to my regal grace, no doubt!
Be grateful, commoners.

Meh-meh! What should Tora do?
Thinking making head hurt!

Commoner, do you not know there
is no baser folly than indecision?

This task seems beneath me.
Let the common Blades handle it.

Sure, sure... We'll accept it for now,
and figure out who to assign later.
Not ruling you out yet, Kubira!
Heard any juicy rumors lately?

A juicy rumor? Where? I'd eat
that in a baguette, with loads of
ketchup!

This is the kind of job I could
just swallow whole!

I'm sure you can handle it, Idaten.
But let's try and keep the snack breaks
in check this time, yeah?
Man, what a bitter situation.

Bitter situations? I don't like 'em!
But I'll still eat 'em!

We can handle this.
Isn't that right, Idaten?
I'll do anything for a tasty treat!

Much thanks! Tora want to give ten
Tasty Sausages to show gratitude!

That's the kind of display of gratitude
that I like!

Is there something troubling you?
Maybe you've fallen head-over-heels
in love with me? If so, I'm sorry, but...

I don't think that's quite what's
going on here. Something is
bothering you though, yeah?

Hi there! I'm feeling pretty great today.
You can tell by how cute I look, see?

Tora feeling extra good too!
Like eaten 100 Tasty Sausages!
...But maybe we should let friend talk.

A problem safely resolved...
all thanks to Hotaru here!
Teehee... You're making me blush.

Ah, this is a real mess.
Hotaru, what do you reckon?

Um, I'm not too sure myself.
But I trust your judgment, Nia.

You can leave this to us!
Right, Hotaru?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Oh, Rex. Do you ever see a
troublesome situation and NOT
get us all mixed up in it...?

We need you to fill our ears with the
latest gossip! Oh, that reminds me.
Tora...where do Nopon keep their ears?

This wing-thing actually have ear
function! But right now should be
listening to gossip, not to Tora!

Come on, let's take care of it, Rex-san!
Oh, but we should buy a lucky charm
first. Can never be too careful!

Erm...I'd rather skip the lucky charm bit
and get started now, if it's all the same.

Why, that's terrible!
We should try to alleviate the
situation with some lucky charms!

Kasane... I'm not sure that will get to
the root of the problem...

We're here to help!
You're down with that, right, Meleph?

Indeed. The kindness in your heart,
at least, will not lead us astray.

Zeke-san... We've got to do something
to help!

Sure thing.
We've got the manpower for it.

Mikumari, you look like you're about
to explode with curiosity.

I can't deny it!
I want to hear all the details!
This doesn't sound like an easy task...

Really? I think it'll be a breeze if
the two of us work together!

Hardly the toughest job we've
ever faced, was it, Rex?

Thanks to you, it was a cinch!
I mean, and to everyone else too...

This is right up our street!
My whole body's itching to get
stuck in and sort everything out!

Yeah, I can feel my Eye of Shining
Justice tingling with anticipation too.
You are safe now! Leave this to us!

And that's the Flamebringer talking,
so you know she means it!
Hmmm...? Is something up?

Go on, Rex.
Find out what this is about.

We've got this one covered!
We'll sort everything out in a jif.
Right, Seori?
Yes. We'll give it our all.
This is a difficult problem...

Indeed. But that is precisely why
we must remain calm and consider
it carefully.

Seori... I think we should help,
don't you?
I agree...
Hmmm... What d'you think, Seori?

I'm a little concerned.
Are you all right?

It is precisely in times of difficulty
that we must work together.
Onward!

Well said, Tokiha!
I know you can do this!
No...WE can do this!

I guess we can rest easy now.
Right, Tokiha?
I'm just glad we could be of some use!

Tokiha. The time for us to help
those in need is at hand.
Indeed. I'll give it my all, body and soul!

Hahah! You really think that would
be a problem for the Zekenator?!

Zeke, maybe it's not my place to say,
but you could try to show just a little
bit of humility sometimes?

Here is what you seek.
We offer it humbly.

Tokiha very sophisticated sometimes...
Tora should model this behavior in
new subroutine for Hana...

Ooh, it sounds like there's something
bothering you? Tell us everything!
From the lowdown to the wild rumors!
We can probably skip the wild rumors...

I'm Zakuro! And I want all your gossip!
And right after, you get all mine!

Zakuro... You might have to tell them
about your new haircut some other
time.

Hey, how have you been, stranger?
Doing good? Yeah, I bet.
Well, as for me, I've been...

Zakuro! They don't need your
life story! We want to hear
what they have to say...
Can you give us the relevant details?

Yeah, just the relevant details!
No unnecessary gossip at all!
Though if you reeeeally want to...

Tora and friends handle this easy!
With Zakuro and Hana on job too,
there no way we can fail!

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     The little bag of fluff isn't filling me full
of confidence for some reason...

Hey, Hikari, just a heads-up...
I'm going to take care of this one
so well, it'll make you look bad!

Hoping to show your Driver what
you can do? Well, so am I.
How about we both give it our all?
Well, that's that!

I for one will be sleeping a
whole lot better tonight!

At the hands of the Flamebringer,
all troubles are swiftly reduced to ash!
Heheheh...
Oh, she exaggerates...

Well, this does not sound like a whole
bunch of fun, huh, Rex?
Yeah, it sounds pretty bad...

Hana-san... You're a big girl now.
Maybe you know how to handle
this kind of thing?

As mature person, Hana know
that problem best solved by
all discuss together.
Ah, this is tough...

Rex, I just want to say, we're all 100%
behind you, because we like, trust you.

Hey, Zeke. I bet your Eye of Shining
Justice would take care of this in a
jiffy. Am I right?

Well...yeah...but because I'm so
awesome, I can do this without even
busting out that forbidden power!

We'll have this right as rain
in a jiffy! With a party like this,
anything's possible!

Zakuro right! Tora and Zakuro and friends
can take care of this!

Zakuro, we can fix this if we work
together, right?

Don't doubt it, girl! It'll be a great
